items.name: Motorola G9
items.description: Powered by the AI-enabled Qualcomm Snapdragon 662 octa-core processor and 4 GB RAM, the Moto G9 provides a smart, super-responsive, and supercharged performance

items.name: Realme Narzo 10
items.description: With a powerful 48 MP AI Quad camera that combines the power of four different lenses, you can capture a perfect picture in any scenario. Also, the high-resolution 48 MP primary lens helps you click beautiful and ultra-clear photos.

items.name: Realme 6i
items.description: The realme 6i features a large 16.5 cm (6.5) FHD+ display and a refresh rate of 90 Hz that provide visuals much smoother than a standard display, ensuring an immersive entertainment experience.

items.name: OnePlus Nord
items.description: OnePlus well known for camera quality & processor
